messages.subject: interview opportunity for unschoolers - unschooling and the Internet
messages.msgSnippet: Michelle Rafter, the reporter with the Industry Standard (www.thestandard.com), contacted me to say that she has received an overwhelming response and now has
messages.messageBody:
Michelle Rafter, the reporter with the Industry Standard
(www.thestandard.com), contacted me to say that she has received an
overwhelming response and now has more than enough sources for her article
on unschooling. Please do not send her any more responses (I guess many of
us were in "talkative" moods this Fourth of July and had the free time to
respond!).

If you passed the request message on to any friends, please pass this "cease
and desist" request to them as well.

Thank you and I hope everyone has a wonderful Fourth of July!

Billy
Family Unschoolers Network
http://www.unschooling.org
fun@...

(I apologize in advance if you see this on more than one list as it gets
passed around)

messages.subject: interview opportunity for unschoolers - unschooling and the Internet
messages.msgSnippet: Michelle Rafter, a reporter with the Industry Standard (www.thestandard.com), is writing an article on unschoolers and the Internet. She s interested in
messages.messageBody:
Michelle Rafter, a reporter with the Industry Standard
(www.thestandard.com), is writing an article on unschoolers and the
Internet. She's interested in finding out some of the resources used for
unschooling children and if there any special web sites devoted to
unschooling. Do unschoolers just turn their kids loose on the Web and let
them explore, and could they unschool without the Internet? If you would
like to answer these questions and others about unschooling, please contact
Michelle by July 9, 2000 to arrange an interview.

Michelle V. Rafter
Contributing Writer, The Industry Standard
LIVEWIRE columnist, Reuters
Phone: (714) 870-6722
Fax: (707) 248-5013
Email: mvrafter@...

As usual, feel free to pass this information on to any families you think
may be interested in participating, but please include the entire message
and be sure to note the response deadline of July 9, 2000.

Billy
Family Unschoolers Network
http://www.unschooling.org
fun@...

(I apologize in advance if you see this on more than one list as it gets
passed around)
